TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SecurityKeyElement extends System.IdentityModel.Tokens.SecurityKey

Docs.summary: Provides delayed resolution of security keys by resolving the or only when cryptographic functions are needed. This allows a key identifier clause or key identifier that is never used by an application to be serialized and deserialized on and off the wire without issues.
Initializes a new instance of the class.
